user.title: Bosch eBike Setup
user.description: Connect your Bosch eBike with ConnectModule to Home Assistant. You will be redirected to Bosch to authenticate.

auth.title: Authenticate with Bosch
auth.description:
1. Click this link to authenticate: [{auth_url}]({auth_url})

2. Log in with your Bosch Flow account

3. After logging in, you'll see an error page (this is normal!)

4. Copy the URL you captured in your browser DeveloperTools (Network-Tab)
 Example: **onebikeapp-ios://com.bosch.ebike.onebikeapp/oauth2redirect?state=akY...&code=dd6...5f8**

5. Paste the URL (or just the code) below:
